Rule.Name: Enable Application-Specific Logging (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Application-specific logging is not enabled, which may reduce visibility into application events.
Rule.Correction: grep -q '^org.apache.catalina.level' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/logging.properties && sed -i 's|^org.apache.catalina.level.*|org.apache.catalina.level = FINE|' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/logging.properties || echo 'org.apache.catalina.level = FINE' >> $CATALINA_HOME/conf/logging.properties; systemctl restart tomcat10

Rule.Name: Specify File Handler for Logging (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: No file handler is specified for logging, which may result in logs not being saved to disk.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Specify a file handler for logging.

Rule.Name: Set Logger className in context.xml (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The className attribute for logging is not set correctly in context.xml, which may prevent correct logging.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure the className is set correctly for logging in context.xml.
Rule.Correction: grep -q '<Logger' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/context.xml && sed -i '/<Logger/ s|<Logger|<Logger className="org.apache.catalina.logger.FileLogger"|' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/context.xml || sed -i '/<\/Context>/i <Logger className="org.apache.catalina.logger.FileLogger" directory="logs" prefix="catalina." suffix=".log" timestamp="true"/>' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/context.xml; systemctl restart tomcat10

Rule.Name: Set Logger Directory to Secure Location in context.xml (Manual)
Rule.Section: Set Logger Directory to Secure Location
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The logging directory specified in context.xml is not a secure location, which may allow unauthorized access.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure the logging directory in context.xml is set to a secure location.

Rule.Name: Ensure Logging Pattern is Correct (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The logging pattern in context.xml is not set correctly, which may result in incomplete log information.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure the logging pattern in context.xml is correct.
Rule.Correction: grep -q 'pattern=' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/context.xml && sed -i 's|pattern="[^"]*"|pattern="%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %s %b"|' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/context.xml || sed -i '/<Logger / s|<Logger|<Logger pattern="%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %s %b"|' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/context.xml; systemctl restart tomcat10

Rule.Name: Set Logging Directory to Secure Location in logging.properties (Manual)
Rule.Section: Set Logging Directory to Secure Location in logging.properties
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The directory specified in logging.properties for log files is not a secure location.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure the directory specified in logging.properties is a secure location.
